Type Property# providedUnit

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
static var providedUnit: MeasurementFormatter.UnitOptions { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/MeasurementFormatter/UnitOptions-swift.struct/providedUnit#Discussion)

Specifies that the provided unit for the measurement should be used.
